text: Toure Show x Jay Smooth. “I Keep It 110% Real.” The illest intellectual is my man  @jsmooth995 , a brilliant guy who cares deeply about race, hiphop, and the life of the mind. My kinda guy. Great convo. Let me know what you think. http://Applepodcasts.com/toureshow
author: Toure

text: Most presidents use a national address to try to calm the nation. Trump used one to try to create panic.
author: Toure

text: Look at how the young conservative lies to his followers. He says Schumer & Pelosi are doing all this so that undocumented people can vote for them. But he knows that’s not what this is about for them. Stop the scaremongering.
author: Toure

text: Nothing the President said tonight was worthy of demanding the nation’s attention. He did not say anything new or say anything that had to be heard by everyone right away.
author: Toure

text: Mark Levin is on Fox calling Pelosi and Schumer “pathological liars” who “are putting the Democratic party ahead of the country.” Does he just take the things that Trump does and say that’s what Dems are? People who listen to this guy have no earthly idea what’s really going on.
author: Toure

text: It’s amazing how much Trump and Fox care about the real tragedy of a citizen dying but care nothing about the real tragedy of children from other countries dying in American custody.
author: Toure

text: Over on Fox, because Dems have supported border barriers in the past now they must support Trump’s wall even though they’ve already gotten border barriers built.
author: Toure

text: Wow! Where’d you get that beauty?!?
author: Toure

text: Chris Cuomo is arguing that Dems are being hypocritical because they’ve supported border fencing in the past. Wow. This sortof bothsidesism is very corrosive to America.
author: Toure

text: He still thinks building a wall around your house is the same as a wall around a nation. I can’t.
author: Toure

text: I’ve stopped counting Trump’s lies. I’m waiting to hear a true statement.
author: Toure

text: If Trump is concerned about illegal drugs why not support legalization? That would destroy the underground market. A wall wouldn’t dent it.
author: Toure

text: Back in my day Instagram was for photos! It wasn’t a gotdamn TV. The pictures were still and they didn’t move and we liked it that way.
author: Toure

text: Reminder: there is no national security crisis at the border. There is no national emergency. Except for Trump in the WH. That is the national emergency.
author: Toure

text: Liar.
author: Toure

text: OMG.
author: Toure

text: People who want the wall must picture the border as open fields. The majority of the fenceable part of the border already has a physical barrier. The Wall adds nothing but most of Trump’s work does just that.
author: Toure

text: Zero terrorists have been caught trying to cross at the Southern border. A minuscule percentage of drugs are crossing at the Southern border. Immigrant crossing has dropped significantly. What aspect is a wall going to fix???
author: Toure

text:
Don Trump Jr  is telling friends that he will be indicted. 

#BOOM
author: Toure

text: The President is speaking tonight and we don’t know whether he will declare a national emergency. But if there was an actual national emergency we would already know that.
author: Toure

text: Real facts show the border is not dangerous, undocumented immigrants are not dangerous, and immigrants are now coming in numbers that are a fraction of what they were 10 years ago. Stop watching Fox. It’s not news.
author: Toure

text: Now this is how you reduce an argument to nothing. “If you're saying walls don’t work then you’re saying you're against housing? And churches?? And hospitals??? How could you hate churches and hospitals you libtard!!!"
author: Toure

text: Well played.
author: Toure

text: The President’s idea that bill collectors can and will understand when unpaid federal workers can’t pay their bills shows how disconnected he is from reality.
author: Toure

text: If you live paycheck to paycheck, like many federal workers, then getting back pay months from now, won’t make a difference over the next few weeks as you try to make it through.
author: Toure

text: I love that scene.
author: Toure

text: Wash Post: There is no issue on which Trump has lied more often than immigration.
author: Toure

text: Trump has said at least 94 times that the wall is already being built. It’s not.
author: Toure

text: All four living ex Presidents have gone on record to say they have not privately told Trump that they wanted to or should have built a wall. Yet another lie.
author: Toure

text: There is no crisis on the Southern border.
author: Toure

text: Is the wall a monument to Trump or a monument to hate?
author: Toure

text: Undocumented immigrants are less likely to be arrested for crime or homicide than native born Americans. The argument that undocumented immigrants are bringing the crime is bankrupt and racist. They’re people who come here to work, often at jobs that are pretty crappy.
author: Toure

text: I just saw a reporter say the White House says IRS refunds will happen so that’s coming. Media must treat comments by Trump and the WH with a grain of salt—we can’t say ‘If they announce something it will happen.’ They contradict themselves all the time.
author: Toure

text: There is no national security crisis at the Southern border. To say otherwise is to lie.
author: Toure

text: How come those who want a Southern border wall don’t call for a Canadian border wall?
author: Toure

text: Why is Corey Lewandowski on MS?
author: Toure

text: The border is not a crisis. Trump is a crisis.
author: Toure

text: There is no border crisis.
author: Toure

text: Dude we all saw you say, “We have defeated ISIS."
author: Toure

text:
How is it @RCARecords didn’t dump R. Kelly today???

#SurvivingRKelly
author: Toure

text:
How is it @RCA didn’t dump R. Kelly today???

#SurvivingRKelly
author: Toure

text: There is no crisis at the border. https://twitter.com/Mikel_Jollett/status/1082404986980462592 …
author: Toure

text: Thank you my brother!
author: Toure

text: It would be great if media would point out Trump’s lies in real time. When he addresses the nation place on the bottom third (Not true) whenever he lies.
author: Toure

text: Seriously? TV execs say they see themselves in the following conundrum: either let Trump go on their air and blatantly lie to the American people OR deal with Trump saying mean things about people he’s already called the enemy of the people? Are you fucking kidding me???
author: Toure

text: @karenhunter Thank you my friend. Means a lot coming from you.
author: Toure

text: Never forget that Mitch McConnell has supported Trump as faithfully anyone in Washington.
author: Toure

text: I don’t need a court of law to make up my mind about R Kelly. It would be stupid of me to look at the horde of accusers and the mountain of evidence and then put my brain on pause. Aa jury hasn’t decided so who knows?
author: Toure

text: In NYT’s story about finding Jazmine Barnes’s shooter they quote Fox News Sheriff David Clarke saying, “They blamed this on a white guy? Seriously? I could have told you it wasn’t a white guy who did this.” That’s a real life Uncle Ruckus right there.
author: Toure

text: The name already fits.
author: Toure

text: #SurvivingRKelly Looks like @R_KellyFans continues to worship him. What an enabler.
author: Toure

text: I don’t oppose the wall to score political points or to keep Trump from a victory. I oppose the wall because it’s a dumb use of money, it’s an ineffective tactic, and it’s never been about national security—it’s a monument to hate. We gotta tear those down, not build new ones.
author: Toure

text: If you’re going to ask progressive politicians whether they think Trump is a racist then please be sure to ask conservative politicians that, too. And follow up with “How can you possibly argue he’s not racist?” Don’t let them shift the conversation.
author: Toure

text: The wall has nothing to do with national security. Most undocumented immigrants fly into the country. Zero terrorists have come in through the Southern border. The wall is only a way to motivate anti-immigrant sentiment. Stop watching Fox. It’s not news.
author: Toure

text: Let’s be real: the point of the wall is not stopping immigrants. The point is lookin tough.
author: Toure

text: It doesn’t matter whether Trump’s wall is made of steel or concrete. Either way, it's a monument to hate.
author: Toure

text: Maybe Pelosi should cut out the orange middle man and negotiate directly with Limbaugh.
author: Toure

text: It feels like almost everybody in America watched #SurvivingRKelly.
author: Toure

text: @noname Hi! I love your MCing and I’d love to have you on my podcast. Can we talk on DM?
author: Toure

text: Trump will give the State of the Union on Jan 19. Less than two weeks. What if the government is still shut down??? Even if this was a daytime soap opera the storyline would not be believable.
author: Toure

text: This is now the third-longest shutdown in American history.
author: Toure

text: I do wonder why Elizabeth Warren thought this was the time to jump into the race. It’s very, very early and Presidential races are often cruel to people who jump in too early. Why not wait a few months?
author: Toure

text: I’m confused because Trump says only criminals don’t want the wall but he’s a criminal (ok, he’s an un-indicted co-conspirator in multiple crimes) and he does want the wall so I’m confused.
author: Toure

text: That’s silly. Mitt Romney is definitely not on steroids.
author: Toure

text: @jbouie Did it bother you that the monster inside Tom Hardy was triggered each time it was called a “parasite" like that was it’s own sort of n-word? That was weird! #VenomMovie
author: Toure

text: Local news just called the shutdown a “stalemate.” That kindof bothsidesism is part of the problem.
author: Toure

text:
Dems: Let’s reform voting in ways that’ll make it fairer and allow more people to vote.

Reps: We need a wall.
author: Toure

text: People who support Trump complained about someone cursing. The hypocrisy is mind boggling.
author: Toure

text: Classy response by @chelsea_janes.
author: Toure

text: I was extremely disappointed to see Speaker Pelosi say Black Lives Matter and then quickly couple it with the hollow phrase all lives matter. The impulse to combine the two to is offensive.
author: Toure

text: You’re living the thing you’re accusing me of.
author: Toure

text: Your turn @kellznation! What did you think of #SurvivingRKelly???
author: Toure

text: R Kelly is a serious predator and his story has been denied for decades. This current reckoning is long overdue. You're not being intelligent when you say what about all the white attackers? In doing that, you’re shifting blame and attention and you’re defending Kelly. Sit down.
author: Toure

text:
"Got a bag and fixed my teeth.
Hope you hoes know it ain't cheap."
author: Toure

text: I don’t have a problem saying it: @mattklewis is neither bold nor courageous for writing this. He’s wack.
author: Toure

text: We're shooting Toure Show live this week on Thursday 1/10 at 6:30pm at @BRICTV in Ft. Greene, Brooklyn. I’ll be interviewing the great actor @terrycrews from Brooklyn 99. Come hear Terry talk about acting and his journey to success. Get free tix here:
author: Toure

text: Your nieces should be more careful.
author: Toure

text: I find it infuriating when Trump uses fictional opinions to make points. Federal workers have not told him they’re fine without their paychecks and they'd prefer a wall to being able to pay their bills.
author: Toure

text: I’m proud of my friend @dreamhampton for creating an historic docu-series. No one else could’ve made this piece.  #SurivingRKelly
author: Toure

text: The R Kelly tape was a phantom. You heard about it and then you knew someone who had it but they wouldn’t give it up and then finally you found someone who gave it to you. I got a VHS tape from someone I worked with at MTV. That tape was pretty insane.  #SurvivingRKelly
author: Toure

text: “Do you like teenage girls?” is a softball question. I assumed Kels would say no. I had a follow up prepared in response to him saying no. But he didn’t say no. Not with his mouth nor with his face. Yes, I was shocked but I wanted him to not see that.
author: Toure

text: It happens at 2am at every bar in the city.
author: Toure

text: Just so we’re clear, calling Elizabeth Warren “Sacagawea” is racist and totes unacceptable.
author: Toure

text: Fox is not news.
author: Toure

text: Even if that were true, no. A few hundred people coming to a nation of 350 million so they can work really hard in our fields and in the service industry for substandard wages, no that’s not a national emergency. At all. Stop watching Fox. It’s not news.
author: Toure

text: Wait, what happened to Mr. Wheat???
author: Toure

text: Is that what the NRA is all about?
author: Toure

text: If you think CNN is fake news then I bet you’d be interested in buying this bridge over here.
author: Toure

text: Yes CNN is problematic—their love of left vs right barroom brawls is not an effective way to communicate info or educate people about what’s going on. But to dismiss their entire news gathering operation as fake says you’re a fool who’ll buy any BS Trump is selling.
author: Toure

text: I’m just saying you should be embarrassed to say CNN is fake. In saying that you’re saying you blindly believe the word of a compulsive liar. Does that make sense?
author: Toure

text: Aaliyah lied and said she was 18. That’s how she got around that. https://twitter.com/HeatherLStarr/status/1081318758243680257 …
author: Toure
